price: Such are the comparisons We set forth for people, but none will understand them except the people of knowledge.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
